Name: Phanice's Group
description:
Phanice is a 44-year-old proud mother of four children. She is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing her group of 16 farmers in Teso District.

Since joining One Acre Fund in 2015, Phanice has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Phanice described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund.

She is very excited to also be purchasing two solar lights, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during the night and have somewhere to charge her phone.

With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Phanice’s Group will be able to plant a total of 12.25 acres of land and purchase a total of 13 solar lights.
